titles.title: Honoring Chris Mazdzer of Saranac Lake, New York, for proudly representing the United States in three consecutive Olympic Winter Games.
Honoring Chris Mazdzer of Saranac Lake, New York, for proudly representing the United States in three consecutive Olympic Winter Games.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Congratulates Chris Mazdzer and his hometown of Saranac Lake, New York, on his performance at the 2018 Winter Olympic Games in Pyeongchang, South Korea.
Recognizes Mazdzer for skillfully representing the United States at three consecutive Olympic Winter Games.
